title: Easy peasy chicken noodle soup
ingredients: ['2 1/2 (295g) tins condensed cream of chicken soup', '1 (295g) tin condensed cream of mushroom soup', '1.25 litres chicken stock', '280g diced, cooked chicken breast meat', '2 teaspoons onion powder', '1 teaspoon seasoning salt', '1/2 teaspoon garlic granules', '500g fresh tagliatelle pasta']
